titleStmt.title: A resolve of the person of the king, or, A corrector of the answerer to the speech out of doores justifying the vvorthy speech of Master Thomas Chaloner a faithfull member of the Parlement of England.
titleStmt.author: Marten, Henry, 1602-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: As truly printed by Evan Tyler printer to the kngs [sic] most excellent Majestie, as were the Scotish papers,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry Marten. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: stained and cropped, with print print show-through, and loss of text; Copy at reel 2996:26 is improved.
Reproduction of originals in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 1746:28) and Sutro Library (reel 2996:26).

person.persName: the kngs [sic] most excellent Majestie, as were the Scotish papers
